mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (email, password, phone, name, address, longitude, latitude, auth) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{name}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{auth})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET email = #{email}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, createdDate = #{createdDate}, modifiedDate = #{modifiedDate}, profileImgUrl = #{profileImgUrl}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, auth = #{auth} WHERE userId = #{userId}
